sentence.Network_en: I just wanted to explore Paris, read Sartre, listen to Sidney Bechet.
sentence.Network_cn: 我就想逛逛巴黎，读读萨特的作品，听听悉尼·贝谢的音乐。

sentence.Network_en: Oh, hi there. You must be Sidney.
sentence.Network_cn: 喂，你好。你一定是西德尼吧。

sentence.Network_en: A few days later, I got a call from Sidney Weinberg.
sentence.Network_cn: 几天以后, 我接到西德尼·温伯格的一个电话.
